יחידה נעימה ונוחה מאוד- נקי, שקט, יש פרטיות, חצר  וקרוב מאוד לים. מומלץ מאוד לזוגות.
אחלה מארח
צימר נעים, מעוצב ונקי, עם חצר פרטית וחמודה. מתאים מאוד לזוג. נהננו מאוד.

מקום שקט ונעים.
קרוב לים.
נהננו מפאב הפרה ומועדון ארוחת הבוקר.
תומר מארח נעים ומזמין.
נהננו מאד.
מסודר, נקי, מזגן טוב, מאוד מרווח. היה מעולה ותומר מארח מאוד טוב וזמין להכל בכל שעה. נבוא שוב אם נהיה באזור :)
ממוקם ממש שנייה מחוף ים מקסים , קרוב לבר כיפי (של תומר המארח) מעולה לבריחה קטנה מהשגרה
היה נהדר אצל תומר. דירה יפה, נקייה, ברמת גימור גבוהה מאוד, עם חצר מקסימה.
יחידה מקסימה, היה תענוג!
אירוח מעולה
דירה מקסימה, נעימה ושקטה,נמצאת במיקום אידיאלי, קרוב לחוף ולעכו. תומר היה הכי קשוב וזמין וסייע בכל מה שהיינו צריכים. לכל מי שמחפש חופשה רגועה ליד הים, אנחנו ממליצים בחום.
יחידת דיור מקסימה, נקייה ונוחה. מומלץ!
מקום מקסים! נקי ומסודר, חצר נעימה וכיפית בכל שעות היום! נהנינו להתארח

יחידת דיור קטנה וחמודה. נקייה מאוד ומפנקת. לא ניתן ממש לבשל במקום אבל יש מקומות מצטיינים לאכול בהם במחירים מאוד נוחים.
תומר זמין מאוד ובעלים של פאב מדליק לאללה שתמיד אפשר למצוא בו משהו כיף להעביר את הערב. נהנו מאוד מהמקום וכנראה שעוד נחזור
מקום מקסים, מעוצב בצורה נעימה ונקי מאוד. יש חצר יפהפיה ופרטית. תומר היה זמין מאוד. יש לשים לב שהמטבחון המוזכר בדף הנכס כולל מקרר, מיקרוגל וקומקום אך אין אפשרות בישול.
היחידה נעימה ונוחה מאוד, ממקומת במיקום מצוין והאירוח והתקשורת עם תומר הייתה מצויינת. נשמח לחזור שוב!

נהנינו מאוד מהסטודיו ובמיוחד מהחצר הפרטית. שבי ציון הוא מקום מקסים והמקום של תומר בהחלט מומלץ! יש חוף ים ממש יפה במרחק הליכה.
תומר אפילו הזמין אותנו להופעה בפאב שלו, מה שהפך את הטיול לעוד יותר מהנה אחרי כל כך הרבה זמן בלי הופעות.

התארחנו בסופ״ש והיה מעולה.
היחידה מתוקה עם חצר מרגיעה במושב מהמם במרחק הליכה מהים.
תומר היה זמין לכל שאלה, בקשה והתייעצות. במקרה היתה הופעת סטנדאפ בבר המקומי ותומר דאג לנו לכניסה ולמקומות הכי שווים.
ממליצים בחום!

מיקום מדהים, קרוב לים.
נעים, נקי, מעוצב ושקט.
בעל היחידה איש מקסים :)
יחידה פרטית ומרווחת לזוג, נקי ומאובזר.

name: A Kibbutz house near "Achziv" beach
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Beach access – Beachfront - Guests can enjoy a nearby beach
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Resort access - Guests can use nearby resort facilities
Private backyard – Fully fenced - An open space on the property usually covered in grass
description: Just a  4 minute drive from Israel's northern coastline's finest natural beach strip named "Achziv," is a bright and cheerful small Kibbutz house.  A perfect spot for a small family or a couple seeking to catch the spirit of this special northern atmosphere. the house is colorful and lively,  the back yard is large and shaded by oak trees. a 3 minute drive to the supermarket/restaurants  עדכון קורונה: הבית זמין להשכרות אנו מקפידים מאוד על חיטוי ניקיון (כמו תמיד)The space(עברית אחרי האנגלית) Our House is a small kibbutz house originally built in the 1950's. It has a lot of character and we have painted it to be happy and cheerful. The yellow kitchen has a microwave, an electric range for cocking, and pots and pans. the blue bedroom has a double bed and 2 extra mattresses which can be set on the floor + the bedroom includes a separate air conditioning. The pink bathroom is cute and small. The yellow living room has plenty of sunshine, air conditioning  a sofa and a TV.  The dining room is green and lively with a table, chairs and a fridge.  We have a large backyard with oak trees and chairs to relax. We have an orange tree with lots of oranges in season. a vegetable garden and a late afternoon sea breeze.)הבית שלנו הוא קטן וחביב ונבנה במקור כדירה למשפחה בקיבוץ בתחילת שנות החמישים. ועל כן אנא צפו לבית ישן וחביב עם הרבה אופי ולא לבית משופץ ומודרני. השירותים קטנים וצבועים בצבע ורוד, הכיור במטבח קטן יחסית לכיורים של היום אך אל דאגה, על  מנת לשפר את תנאי הבישול בנינו משטח עבודה למטבח מעץ כתוספת.  בכניסה לבית יש חדר כניסה נעים עם קיר ירוק, בו יש מקרר ושולחן אוכל, כשלא חם מדי מומלץ להשאיר את הדלת הקדמית הגדולה פתוחה לרווחה ולתת לרוחות הצפון והמערב מהים לשטוף את החדר. יש מיקרו, פלטה חשמלית לבישול. קצת סירים צלחות, כוסות וסכו"ם.  חדר השינה "החדר הכחול" מכיל מיטה זוגית ושני מזרונים שניתן להניח על הרצפה . בסלון" החדר הצהוב" יש ספה, כורסא, טלוויזיה ושולחן קטן שאפשר להניח עליו את הבירה או היין. באופן כללי חשוב שתדעו שהריהוט בדירה צנוע. עם הזמן אנו מוסיפים דברים שימלאו אותה ויעשו אותה נעימה וחביבה.  החצר: בצד הבית ומאחוריו היא חצר גדולה לשימושכם. אפשר לעשות מנגל לשבת בזולה מתחת עץ האלון הגדול, למלא בריכת ילדים עם הצינור הירוק שליד העץ תפוז מאחור, אפשר לפרוס את המחצלת שנמצאת בכניסה לבית. ולהרגיש חופשי בחצר לעשות כעולה על רוחכם. לאחרונה בנינו מקלחת חיצונית שניתן להשתמש בה על מנת להתרענן ולשטוף את החול מהים. .Other things to noteעדכון קורונה : הבית פתוח להשכרות. אנו מקפידים מאוד על ניקיון וחיטוי כל המשטחים, כמו כן אנו מקפידים על מרווח  של מספר שעות בין השכרה להשכרה. ניתן גם להזמין ימי "מרווח" נוספים.  (בתוספת תשלום כמובן)Corona update: We take extra care at cleaning and disinfecting all surfaces of the house . We did so anyway but added extra effort .
additional_house_rules:
איך הבית שלנו מעדיף שתתנהגו בו- עברית אחרי האנגלית
No big rules just the basic ones, please no smoking and no pets in the house. once you leave make sure all electric appliances are turned off and put the bed sheets on the floor in a pile. a quick sweeping would be  appreciated.
באופן כללי אין חוקים גדולים, בלי חיות,  בלי עישון בתוך הבית. תשאירו נקי ותזרקו את
האשפה, תסגרו חלונות ומזגנים כשאתם יוצאים וגם תוציאו מהחשמל את הפלטה 
החשמלית, והעיקר תרגישו טוב וקליל. אנו מספקים סדינים חביבים ומגבות למי שנשאר 2 לילות ומעלה.
 למי שנשאר רק לילה אחד נשמח לספק סדנים ומגבות נקיות בתוספת של 50 שח דמי כביסה.
interaction: צרכים עזרה או שאלות תרימו טלפון
transit: מי שמגיע בתחבורה ציבורית ניתן להגיע ברכבת לנהרייה ואז באוטובוס (אין הרבה כאלו) או מונית ספישל 35 שח (אני חושב לא סגור על זה) לקיבוץ גשר הזיו

reviews.comments:
Great place for the value. Amir was a great host, easy to communicate with and was very helpful with check in.
The house is very small but still comfortable. Its looks old and a bit rundown but again for the price it was definitely worth it. The water pressure in the shower was low but there was plenty of hot water.
Comfortable clean unit, larger than we expected, great location and value in the north.
Show graphic location in a Great place I’m considering that it’s in the kibbuz It’s hard to the place But the place much lower that  what I expected .
Great kibutz place. Akhziv is right there, and Amir was super helpful with suggestions for activities nearby.
A very clean place with awesome air conditioning. Would stay there again!
We loved this little cozy place. Met expectations. It was lovely to find coffee and tea. Loved the recommendations in the area, the bakery and the beach.
Amir’s place was great. It was clean and quiet. Amir was easy to talk to and very helpful. Highly recommended

We loved Amir's little house. It is in a beautiful neighborhood - with a delicious bakery nearby. It is cozy and comfy and a great getaway from the city. If we are lucky enough to get back to Israel again sometime soon, we will definitely try to stay there again.

Great place! Good home base to explore northern coastal israel. Amir had great local tips and good specific instructions on to get to his house. Big spacious area in the house and very clean. Kibbutz was super friendly. I would definitely stay here again.
Solid, simple place to crash for a few nights in TLV. Close to Jaffa
Absolutely wonderful place! I would definitely stay here again.
Great host, super helpful, friendly, and flexible. Nice quiet location very close to beaches and tourist sites.

We felt at home and really enjoyed our stay in this beautiful Kibbutz. Great proximity to stunning beaches and scenic parks. Amir was a really kind and gracious host, going out of his way to attend to our needs including our late night arrival. We really recommend!

We loved staying in Amir's home! It was exactly what we needed after a high energy week in Jerusalem. Perfect location to easily get to a few spots we wanted to visit (like Akko and Rosh Hanikra) and very close to the beach for some much needed slow time. Amir's home is funky but clean. We were 4 (two adults & two teens) and we fit perfect. It is so nice and quiet here! And my kids especially loved the local cats that came to say good morning and good night each day :). We loved discovering the wonderful bakery on Kibbutz! Don't miss this if you stay here. My family agreed we'd love to stay again if we are in the area. Thank you!

Amir made me feel very welcome. My main desire was for a quiet place and indeed it was quiet -- not common in a crowded country like Israel. The bed and pillows were super comfortable, and the place had everything I needed in a "funky" but very clean way. The only issue was that the toilet did not flush properly at all. That was not sanitary. By the time I discovered it Amir had left the kibbutz. I also didn't like that he raised the price after I had requested to rent the place and after he had approved my request. He said he had made a mistake in how he had listed it -- but people need to know that raising the price later is not proper practice. Otherwise it was all fine.
reviews.response:
Sorry to hear about the toilet, ill check it right away and fix it.
As for the price change as you mentioned before that's not a problem i will be more than happy to reimburse you with the difference- as you said it was my mistake.
take care

Amir

reviews.comments: היה מעולה. הבית מעוצב בטוב טעם ואמיר זמין לכל שאלה. מושלם למשפחות קטנות.

We loved staying in the little house for the night.  It was clean and it was nice having our own space.  The location is great if you want to visit the spots on the northern coast like Akko and Rosh Hanikra.  There is a great free beach just across from the kibbutz for sunset.  At the entrance of the kibbutz is a gas station that has an Italian restaurant, Sandwich/Coffee shop, and a mini supermarket (lots of stuff including produce) for self catering.

We enjoyed spending an evening are Amir's kibbutz as we travelled the coast of Israel. It was clean, well-maintained, and easy to find. The atmosphere in the community as well as the home were inviting and refreshing. Thanks for a lovely stay! Highly recommended.

Great place to stay for small family or 2-3 friends. This is a very good option for low budget accomodation that includes everything you need and more. Amir was kind and provided all the information about the area.
highly recommended!
We had a great stay, one night only. All good, recommended!
Cozy, old fashioned Kibbutz house with basic amenities and a nice backyard.
wonderful place, lovely hosting

We can’t recommend Amir’s place in Gesher Haziv highly enough - this was our second visit and we really hope to go back again. It’s the perfect base for exploring the north coast - very close to beautiful beaches, great restaurants and amazing hiking. The house is very cute and comfortable and has everything you need.  Amir is an excellent host, very responsive and provides great tips for the area. Highly recommended!!
Great little place. Awesome for couples or 1-2 kid families. Big backyard makes for a great little relaxation spot. Beware tiny bathroom! ;)
Simple in pleasent place at a great location.

Our trip at Amir and Adi’s small cottage was just perfect for our family of 4 (we are actually a family of 7!!! But we travelled with our youngest daughters) and the girls just loved the place! From the moment we booked our trip, Amir was always available and answered any question we had very fast. The house is exactly as pictured and as described. It is within minutes of the most beautiful beach in Israel! There was everything we needed for a comfortable trip up north. We thank you so much and we will definitely be back! Highly recommended!

The appartement is very cute and fully equipped with everything you might need for a comfortable stay. Also its location gives you amazingly quick access to different beaches and attractions. Amir was always super fast to respond to any questions we have. So if you're looking for a quiet yet easily accessible appartement in Israel's north we can only reccomend this one.

amir's place is a small and sweet house in the kibbutz, you can tell the place, while simple, is very loved, with small touches everywhere. The location is amazing 4 minutes drive from the beautiful beach of Achziv. We had a wonderful time and will be back for sure.
reviews.response: כיף לקרוא. תודה

reviews.comments: Nice place. Quiet area. Amir responded quickly.
This was the perfect place! Very cute place, with everything we could need, very close to the beach, and in a lovely place. Amir was extremely helpful and responsive. Very highly recommended!
Nice quite place

This cute little house is a bit of a time travel to 1950s kibbutz. It is small, but full of character and had everything we needed for a short family vacation. Amir’s tips and suggestions for activities were perfect, and even though we are quite familiar with the western Galilee, we were pleased to make new discoveries in the area. The place was clean and ready for us and communication with Amir was great.
Had a great time! Adorable house.
We had a great time! Very nice place

A really awesome place to stay! The bakery in the kibbutz is very nice (and so are the people). The place is super cute and cozy, and the supermarket is super close incase you want some nice home meals! Having a proper yard was awesome, we did a barbecue and had dinners outside. Over all a really wonderful experience and I would absolutely recommend this place

The house is cozy and was a good fit for our family of four. The garden is great and the kibbutz is quiet. Contact with Amir was fast and easy, and he helped out with our requests.

The local bakery (Lechem Tene) is fantastic. A few minutes' drive will get you to one of the most beautiful beaches in Israel.

In short - warmly recommended!!
Good place and very good experience! Very minimalistic though.
Lovely little place at an amazing location. Amir was kind, available and helpful.

Nice place, exactly as described.
Clean, simple and homey.
Amir was very informative and nice

We had an incredible stay at amir's place. It was so close to the beach. Amir was very attentive whenever we had a question. The space was adorable. It was decorated so artsy and we had a blast hanging out in the backyard barbique and all. My kids loved the books and games. We can't wait till our next trip.
Very simple but good value for the price

Amir's place is wonderful. Great value for money. The place is clean, nicely decorated and very cozy.
Amir is a great host. Very kind and responsive.

Amir, thank you so much for a lovely stay! We enjoyed the peaceful mornings, the sweet house and the green surroundings a lot. It was super child friendly: beds, games, toys, books, and a little splash pool.  I wish we could have stayed longer.

The house has a lovely courtyard. The house was clean and nicely decorated.  The street is quiet. The kibbutz is lovely. Amir sent us an email with detailed information about the area, which was helpful. It was exactly what we were looking for in a convenient, inexpensive, comfortable get-away to the beach.

Amir's place is homey and cozy. It's a little Kibutz apartment with warn styling. The kids loved the closet with toys, and we all enjoyed the garden with the pool and outdoors shower!!
Very close to one of the most beautiful shores of Israel. Amir sent out all info with some great recommendations. We will definitely love to stay here again in the future
Great place, highly recommended

A cute and quite peacefull place with all you need, carefully collected and presented, cleaned up and  clean. Family friendly at all. House and garden are cerca to the beaches, a car is helpfull. Aswell helpfull and very friendly: Amirs brother, who lives beside. We loved to stay!
Great location by the sea and the mountains. Even if we didn’t meet personally, Amir was really helpful and gave us very accurate information and nice local tips on trips.
Good location, nice little house and great communication with the host

Very nice place to stay. The area is all green and quiet with a alot to do around.
The communication with Amir was easy and fast and very helpfull.
Excellent stay
Cute little place. Truely as described. Modest but welcoming.
Great place, me and my girlfriend stayed for 2 nights and enjoyed it a lot. Great location, cosy and clean place. Highly recommend
Good communication, a beautiful area, quiet.
Lovely place

The accommodation is simple, comfortable and lovely. We especially appreciated the outside space and sitting under the shade of the trees in the heat of the day. Peaceful location and a great base for local beaches and amenities.

We would love to come back again some day.

We had a great stay in this original kibbuz house. It‘ s perfectly located and close to many nice places, and it is equiped with everything needed. Communication with Amir was very friendly, helpful and uncomplicated. A good place to visit!
Amir’s place is located in a very strategic point. It is a way to experience the kibbutz way of life. A bit difficult to find, but overall good to stay there.
We had a good stay to Amir’s place for a night :)
Great place, great location. We had a wonderful stay and would be glad to stay there again one day.
Thanks Amir. Nice little place.
The house of Amir ist really old-kibbuz-style. The area around ist perfekt: A few really nice beaches not too gar away and Rosh ha Nikra and Akko near by.
Nice spot, great beaches. The village has a great bakery
We had a wonderful stay and were very satisfied with everything! I greatly recommend this place. It was very easy to communicate with the host. Perfect
Our stay was very comfortable, it's a nice small house with everything you need. There's a small garden also which is perfect to have a sunny breakfast :)

The place was great, lovely little house just the way I love. Amir is a great host - very attentive and helpful. After we've left, he even did extra effort to quickly ship us an item we've left at his house. Warmly recommended!!!
Nice house with a garden.

We had a lovely 2 night stay at Amir’s place and wish it could have been longer. The location is perfect - just a short drive or 20 min walk from probably the best beach we visited in Israel. Amir was extremely responsive and provided some of the best local knowledge we have ever been given. Our personal highlight was the local bakery, which also does great coffee!

The place itself is nice and unique and well looked after. It has everything you need for a comfortable stay for a family of 4 and the garden was a nice bonus.
Overall we would highly recommend it!
Clean and tidy apt. Well equipped and very nice overall

Very nice small Kibbutz rustic residential unit with a lovely garden. The unit is particularly fitting for a couple or small family. Amir is a great host, always responding fast to any questions or doubts. Highly recommend!
Amir was very helpful and nice. Spending a couple of days in the kibbuz was a great experience.
A bit old styled however very comfy place. You need a car here.

We spent one night here just as a stop as we were travelling down the coast. The location is good for that. It's an old fashioned living space in a very new and modern neighbourhood.  The place itself is like a little cottage and is very basic, including the kitchen and bathroom. Location is nice if you have a car.
Fantastic space at a great location. Had everything we needed and more, including a great atmoshphere!
Amir is great and caring, there where some issues with the electricity but he really caren and a technician arrived  the next morning
We had very relaxed Days in the surrounding and in Amirs nice and cozy house. Absolutely recommended!
A cozy, clean , and charming little place! I would happily stay here again!
A gem. A charming and fascinating house, very clean and comfortable. Everyone was very friendly, a welcoming and peaceful place.

Amir’s place is the perfect place to come to and relax for a couple of days in his house in the middle of this nice kibboets. Very friendly & very welcoming as he has a couple of good tips and suggestions.. highly recommended and we would go there again for sure...

Great little place :)
We had everything needed.
Amir's place has the perfect location in this area, and the communication with him was quick and always available. Perfect for young travelers.

We had a great stay at Amir's place, it filled all our needs. The house is old, but in a great shape. Very clean and equipped with all the utilities you need. Keep in mind there is a couple of stairs to the entrance. It's location is close to every attraction in the area, the kibbutz is located on the main road.

Great location! Less than 5 minutes to achziv beach, the best place for children with lagune and beautiful sunsets. 20 minutes from Acre with it's top quality seafood and hummus. The house is small yet equipped with everything one might need. Amir was helpful and gave us wonderful tips about places we should visit. We spent 4 nights in September with two small kids and very much enjoyed our holiday.
We had a really nice time at Amir’s house!
nice house very close to the sea. A little bit small but nice
Great house , been there 4 nights in August with 2 kids and had great time in the house and yard, and around the area!

This is a very basic house. Imagine a kibbutz apartment from the seventies where nothing was changed. But it was super clean and Amir was helpful with everything we needed before and during our visit. He had great recommendations as to what to do and were to go. The location is very convenient, only 5 minutes drive from a variety of beaches and 10-20 minutes drive from multiple hikes and tourist attractions.
We had a wonderful weekend here! Everything was clean and comfortable and Amir was so helpful with suggestions! The location next to Achziv beach is perfect!

We loved our stay in Gesher Haziv - Amir was a great host. House was clean and ready for us. Anything we needed he was just a phone call away - Amir ask sent some great recommendations for things to do in the area. Was the perfect space for a small family. Neighbours were also lovely and helpful. Thanks Amir!
We all enjoyed the house very much. It had everything we needed and the location was fantastic. Amir was kind and available- very recommended

A basic but clean & charming little house for a good price, on a lovely kibbutz in Northern Israel near the sea. The yard, teeming with plants and flowers, had a nice little lounge area and was populated with a few cute cats. We appreciated the fact that both the bedroom and living room had A/C units, which was essential during the heat wave that occurred during our stay. Shower hot water & pressure was great. We were able to cook basic food in the kitchen using the microwave and two-burner electric stove  that were left for us. The place is a convenient distance from the lovely Achziv beach, as well as a great hummus place right on the kibbutz. Our host Amir made sure we were well prepared by providing us with a very thorough  guide of recommendations. In short, we enjoyed our stay and recommend this home to other travelers.

A cosy and homey little house.
Amir was a very caring host.
Nice place
I had a pleasant stay. Great location if you have a car and want to travel around the northern shores.

We contact the hoster (Amir) very late at night because we didn't expect to arrive this area, Amir replied very quickly and accepted our request with well detailed information how to get there with surrounding activities, the place was clean and ready for new guests, equipped kitchen, hot water, sheets towels and all you could ask, even coffee and tea for breakfast in addition for some food to cook (I quickly cooked oatmeal but there was other options).

We really enjoyed our time in Amirs little Kibbutz house. It gave us a real Israel experience by giving us an insight in an old Kibbutz house from the 1950s. Thanks to Amirs plan the house was very easy to find, even at nighttime. The bed was very comfy and we had a really good time in the Kibbutz. It was also really nice to meet Amir. Thank you so much for the inviation and all your help.
Everything worked out perfectly, we had a great time!

We stayed in Amirs house in the (former) Kibbutz in December. Our 1 year old son liked to play with the toys in the house. And there are two playgrounds nearby. We didn't meet Amir, but we had a nice chat with his kind brother.

The location of the house is very nice and we made trips to Akko and Rosh HaNikra.

Thank you very much, Amir for sharing your authentic house with us. Walt slept well in the crib you prepared for him. It was a quite cold. So, we were glad we took the winter sleeping bag of our son with us. And thanks to you there were several blankets and a small heater to keep us warm.
One tip: you could invest in a new hotplate. It was quite slow in heating the pans...

הדירה ממוקמת בקיבוץ מקסים עם שפע מקומות חינמיים ובתשלום לכל דורש. אמיר שלח מייל ברור עם הסברים והמלצות, דבר שמאוד הקל על התכנון.
כמו כן, יש גינה מקסימה וגם משחקים לילדים, מה שעושה את המקום מצוין לילדים ואפשר לנו לשבת בנחת כשהם שיחקו.
הדירה נקיה ומסודרת.

Staying at Amir`s place was just great. The flat is very nice, the location is very good (close to all Western Galilee attractions), it was very easy to communicate and Amir and his wife Adi were very responsive to any question we had.
מקום נפלא בסביבה נהדרת. אמיר היה זמין לשאלות שלנו ותמיד הגיב מהר. מומלץ בחום
מקום נעים מאוד,  בדיוק כמתואר.  אמיר עשה הכל כדי שנרגיש בנוח.  נהנינו מאוד.
דירה נחמדה, מיקום מוצלח. אמיר עזר מאוד וענה במהירות לשאלות.

Amir's place at Kibbutz Gesher Haziv was a lovely place to stay. It has everything you need for a totally chilled few days near the Mediterranean. Don't miss a trip to Banana beach to enjoy a 'Cafe del Mar' experience.
בית מקסים כמו של פעם, פשוט ויפה

The house was nice looking, comfortable, clean, easy to get to, and completely matched our needs (a couple with a small child). Everything in the kitchen and shower worked perfectly. The location is wonderful, 3 minutes driving from achziv beach, the most beautiful spot in Israel, if you ask me.
exactly what we have needed and expected. great host with great communication  highly recommended
Amir's place is great. Absolutely recommended!
נקי, כיפי, מחיר מאוד שפוי, והגליל המערבי אין כמותו :)

זולה מקסימה
מאובזרת היטב
מקום שקט להתנתק מהעולם וקרוב לחופים הכי יפים בארץ. יש ליד גם פיצה מדליקה
A nice place to stay for the night. The area is awesome so it's perfect - very close to the beach and other  places. Amir was very available on the phone and helped us with recommendations.

The green small house of Amir is a kibutz nice and colored house, in a very quiet environment with a near by parking.

A few minutes drive from beautiful
beaches and a small supermarket, we had all we needed and were really happy to be there, we will come back.
reviews.response: you are always welcome back thanks for the nice words.

reviews.comments: Simple and pleasant small kibbutz home with nice outside space. Functional for our family of 5. Few minutes by car to the Akhziv National Park and to Banana beach. Great place to explore the north up to rosh hanikra. Easy communication with the host. This was our second stay at Amir's place, and ready to go back if we will again need a home in the area.

דירה פשוטה ונהדרת עם מיקום מצויין. אל מול הפשטות יש טאצ' אישי בכל דבר בבית ויש שם את כל מה שאתה יכול לחשוב עליו ובצורה יפה, יעילה ואסטטית.
המארח עושה הכל כדי להקל ולעזור.
היתה לנו חופשה מעולה והבית היה נהדר לשהות בו כל יום בצהריים בשעות החום.
מאוד ממליצים.
רונן

Amir is a great host, very helpful and communicative. The place is very nice, with an artistic touch. We loved the atmosphere there and enjoyed our stay a lot. The beach and the nature in the area is very beautiful. We recommend it!

Recommended for all including families seeking a comfortable and spacious accommodation from which to explore the nearby beaches and natural attractions such as Rosh HaNikra and Montfort.
The host, Amir, left great instructions and the accommodation contains all necessary amenities.

השהות בדירת הקיבוץ הפשוטה והנעימה הזאת היתה עבורנו שלווה ומספקת. הארוח של אמיר היה מסביר פנים, ומכוון להנעים את שהותנו בדירה ככל האפשר. קיבוץ גשר ה זיו ממוקם בצורה מושלמת לחופשה בצפון, מבחינת קרבה לחוף הים, אתרים ומסלולים בגליל ואפשרויות קולינריות מגוונות.

בית פשוט וחמוד עם אופי. היה לי מאד נעים לשהות בו. יש שקט , באתי לבד והרגשתי עטופה בפרטים הקטנים שבו - שולחן, מפה,חלון,ציור,לימונית.......היינו במעין דיאלוג מכבד(אניוהבית),מרחב וקירבה/אהבה.
מקווה לשוב לכאן.
נורית.

We had a great stay in Adi and Amir's house!
Simple and basic, which we love, but colourful, cozy and complete. Amir is very communitive and caring for his guests. It's special when someone opens his house and a bit of his life, it connects people which is fine these days.
The bakery is the place to be friday morning, as well as Achziv Beach and so much more in the North.
So you'd better enjoy! Greetings from Holland: Herre, Natasha, Charlie and Luna Meijer.
nice place, comfy and simple. very close to achziv beach and other attractions in the area. good for a short stay.

מאוד נהננו מהשהות אצל אמיר
למרות הצניעות של המקום היתה מחשבה על כל הפרטים ולא
הרגשנו שהיה חסר לנו משהו, כולל ספרים ומשחקים לילדים
תודה משפחת ביטרמן

we had a great time.
שמחנו להתארח בבית הצנוע והחביב. בית קטן וישן אך עם קסם מיוחד ואוירה נעימה שהתאים לנו מאוד.
במיוחד אהבנו את החצר עם פינת הישיבה המקסימה ואת ארון האוצרות עם מגוון צעצועים וספרים לילדים.
נשמח לחזור ולהתארח.
Small Kibbutz house, very basic accomodation but toatally enough when you do day trips and stuff
מקום מיוחד. נקי מאוד. מיקום מעולה. הקשר עם בעל הבית מאוד ברור ויעיל.  מומלץ בחום !
We only stayed for one night. It was really nice, as we spontaneously decided to stay there and everything worked out really easy!

We stayed two nights at Amir with two small children, we enjoyed excellent location very close to the beach, Rosh Hanikra and many beautiful trip places . The place is quiet, pleasant and Very suitable for the children who loved the back yard and the kibbutz atmosphere.
Instructions and recommendations from Amir greatly helped and contributed greatly to the experience.
Already waiting for the next time!

היה פשוט מעולה !
התארחנו 2 לילות אצל אמיר עם 2 ילדים קטנים, המיקום מצויין נהננו מאוד מהקרבה לחוף אכזיב, ראש הנקרה ומקומות טיול רבים ויפים. המקום שקט, נעים ובייתי. מאד מתאים לילדים שנהנו מהחצר ומהקיבוץ.
ההוראות וההמלצות של אמיר מאוד עזרו ותרמו רבות לחוויה. בקיצור -חוויה מומלצת
We stayed at Amir's for a night, and loved the apartment. Felt like a piece of kibbutz history. everything was just as described and we had everything we needed and more. Thank you !
We had a really nice stay at Amirs house. The house is located really quietly in a Kibbuz and we had everything we needed.

This is a charming kibbutz house, nicely set up and with a spacious yard. Despite being small, it is greatly functional and our family of five stayed there comfortably for 3 days. Location is great if you have a car. Few minutes drive to beautiful beaches, restaurants, supermarkets. Amir is welcoming and easy to reach. At arrival, the house was well stocked with whatever we needed, including toys and books for our small one, and there was food in the fridge! Definitely recommended.

היה נהדר. המקום צנוע, נקי וממוזג עם טאצ׳ אישי נעים...
תמורה מצוינת למחיר משתלם למי שרוצה לטייל, להיות בים ולהנות עם ילדים קטנים. בחוץ מקלחת מגניבה - הילדים ממש התלהבו ממנה ומהבריכה הקטנה.
מאוד נעים ונוח - הקרבה לחוף אכזיב, הפיצריה בתחנת הדלק ובעיקר המקום עצמו... נהננו. נשמח להתארח שוב.

,היי אמיר

This is a late reaction. Six days / nights in your cottage was a good time. It reminded me of the time (1979) when I lived in such a house in a kibbutz. Your cabin was clean, the WIFI worked fine and there was a TV, which we did not use. The airconditining was pleasant. The cottage is in a quiet and clean environment. Incidentally, the whole kibbutz is peaceful and school. My compliments.
I will definitely reserve your house next time. Friends and I will recommend your cottage.

ברכה מהולנד,
ג'ון / Jan
היה לנו ממש כיף

we had a great time at Amir's and everything was as described .this agreat location for anyone touring this part of Israel. plus the added benefit of staying in a typical kibbutz house of the early days (much as changed since). But despite the fact that this is a rather old house ,it has all the needed amenities and good beds and airconditioning, eveything for self catering and not to forget : the outdoor shower for afterbeach showering or midnight cooling. My all hearted recommendation!!!!! best to have yourown transportation

תמורה הולמת למחיר, ידענו למה לצפות- התיאור של אמיר ותגובות של האורחים הקודמים נתנו תמונה מדוייקת ואמיתית.הדרישות שלנו אומנם מאוד צנועות ובסיסיות, ובאנו בעיקר בשביל הים,אך כל מה שהיינו צריכים היה שם,ואף יותר מהמצופה, למעט אולי מתקן  לייבוש כביסה-בגדי ים במקרה שלנו כשחזרנו מהחוף, מגבות וכו'.אגב, חוף ים  מדהים ומומלץ בחום-גן לאומי אכזיב, תודה לאמיר על ההמלצה.כמו כן המלצה נוספת ומוצלחת שניסינו ואהבנו- פיצרייה מעולה בתחנת דלק בכניסה לקיבוץ.כל התקשורת עם אמיר הייתה נוחה ועניינית,כולל שינוי תאריכי האירוח ומפת הגעה לבית.עניין קטן שכדאי לטפל אם אפשר-הדברת  נמלים קטנות בכיור ...הבית הספיק ל4, חניה צמודה,הכל פעל מצויין(מזגים, פלטה חשמלית, טלויזיה,מיים במקלחת, ביוב,wi fi ).לסיכום: נהננו ונרצה לחזור.תודה אמיר
reviews.response: מצחיק אך בדיוק היום חשבתי לקנות מתקן לתליית בגדי ים, אעשה זאת כבר השבוע. תודה על ההמלצה

reviews.comments:
We had a very nice stay at Amir's place: it was clean and cosy basic but well equipted
The area is very beautiful and the beaches are near by
Amir was very helpful and friendly available all the time to answer questions
we will be hapyy to return for another stay

We had a wonderful time at amir's place, its the most perfect spot for a small family seeking for a quiet lovely vacation. We'll definitely be back!
our contact was with amir's wife, she was kind and helpful, they left the key for us and were available for any question on the phone, but there was no problem and we helped our selves and felt just at home :)

It's a lovely apartment in a lovely neighborhood. The apartment was amazing with all the necessary things and with wonderful arrangement by the host. Amir is amazing host, he give us a map to reach his apartment with every small detail. I think his apartment made my parents visit to Israel memorable. I personally recommend to go for his apartment. I think for my next visit, i love stay in same apartment.

we spent 4 nights at amir's house and really enjoyed our time. it's quite, the house has everything you need, the bed is very comfortable, there is a very good bakery in the kibbutz and a nice café at the entrance. amir was easy to reach when we needed him and surprised us with fresh bread and fruits at our arrival.

Amir called us and emailed us a map before we arrived to make sure we would know how to find the house, as we were arriving at night. He seemed quite pleasant and showed concern for us, offering to help us with any information we might need about the area. The house is spartan, but also clean, roomy, light, comfy and sufficient. As an old kibbutz house, it had its charm. The bathroom is small, but everything worked fine. We would return if we ever need a place to stay in the north of Israel near Akko, Achziv, Nahariya or Rosh HaNikra.

The apartment is located in a beautiful Kibbutz. The area is full of attractions and wonderful nature for trips. The apartments is very cute, exactly as described, clean and well Equipped. The Owner Amir and Adi are so nice, they gave us a lot of Recommendations for place to see and good restaurants to eat.
חדר בסיסי אך יש בו הכל. נקי מאוד ההמלצות של אמיר היו מצויינות. יופי של חופשת קיץ בישראל.

הדירה של אמיר בקיבוץ חמודה ואינטימית מתאים במיוחד למשפחה או אנשים שרוצים בית קטן ולא חדר במלון. צבעונית נעימה ואותנטית והכי חשוב אמיר שהיה לנו מי שנתן את הערך המוסף ומילא את כל בקשותינו בשמחה תודה רבה אמיר

מיקום מעולה
דירה נוחה ומאובזרת פתרון מעולה לטיול בצפון
בית חמוד מאוד ונעים, מצויד בכל מה שצריך, גינה נהדרת. מומלץ מאוד!

מקום מתאים לזוג או משפחה עם 2 ילדים.
מיקום מושלם לחופשה ליד הים וטיולים בצפון.
מומלץ

הגענו לגיחה קצרה מאוד באזור(פחות מ24 שעות) והיה לנו נחמד ונעים להתארח בבית. אף על שאמיר היה בחו״ל בזמן האירוח הוא השיב לכל ההודעות והשאלות שלנו בפרק זמן סביר מאוד.
תודה אמיר

תמורה מלאה לכסף. מקום חמוד, עם קסם משלו. עם על מה שצריך במיקום מושלם . 3 דקות ברכב מהים, 2 דקות לבית קפה מעולה עם מאפים מטורפים, עשר דקות מראש הנקרה. הבית עצמו מזכיר בתים של פעם בקיבוץ, אני אישית מתה על כאלה

דירה חמודה ומרווחת בקיבוץ נעים
מתאימה לזוג או זוג עם ילדים וגם ל3-4 מבוגרים אם לא אכפת לכם לחלוק חדר ולישון על מזרון. המטבח והמקלחת היו מאובזרים, הכניסה חלקה ונוחה. אמיר גם נתן לנו המלצות לאזור שהיו באמת מצוינות. מומלץ!

בית קטן ומקסים! נקי מאוד, מסודר ואובזר. התקשורת עם אמיר היתה מצויינת, ולשמחתנו איפשר לנו להשאר יותר זמן בדירה ולעזוב מאוחר:) בטוחה שנחזור שוב לבקר...
בהחלט value for money

הדירה בקיבוץ פשוטה וענתה על הצרכים שלנו. בחדר שינה יש מקום לזוג + שני ילדים על מזרונים על הרצפה. אנחנו הצלחנו להכניס לול קמפינג בנוסף לפעוטה :-)
הדירה מסודרת ומאוד מאורגנת לאירוח של כמה ימים. המטבח מאובזר, והחצר מאוד נחמדה! מקלחת חוץ זה בונוס נהדר!
אמיר שלח לנו המלצות מעולות לטיולים באזור וזה מאוד הוסיף לטיול שלנו, תודה אמיר!

הדירה של אמיר בגשר הזיו נהדרת!! נתחיל בזה שאמיר היה איתי בקשר סמוך למועד ההזמנה עם שלל המלצות. לקראת ההגעה שוב יצר קשר,וכל דבר שהיינו צריכים הוא נתן מענה. הדירה מתוקה,פשוטה ונעימה בסגנון וינטג'. ממש אהבנו. מקום שכיף לחזור אליו אחרי יום של ים,מסלול טיול ובילויים. מיקום נהדר- קרוב לחופי בצת ואכזיב,נחל כזיב,עין חרדלית,מערת קשת,נחל בצת,נהריה  (טיילת נהדרת ואחלה מסעדות). הייתה לנו חופשה מעולה

התארחנו בבית של אמיר לתקופה של 8 לילות! חופשה ארוכה ומדהימה!
אמיר חושב על כל פרט הכי קטן, התקשורת זורמת ותמיד אפשר לפנות ולשאול.
הבית אמנם ישן, אבל נקי ומסודר.
זאת הייתה החופשה הכי טובה שהייתה לנו!
הסיכוי שנחזור גבוה מאד!

מיקום נהדר, כל מה שצריך בשביל משפחה קטנה שמחפשת לטייל באזור.
אמיר מאוד זמין לכל דבר והבית נקי ומסודר
האירוח היה נחמד ונעים! המיקום מעולה ונוח:)
מקום נהדר! בסיסי וחמוד. מיקום נפלא
היה ממש ממש טוב. מומלץ ביותר. מלא מקומות לטייל סביב. תודה רבה
מקום חמוד מאוד, מיקום מצוין. המארח מאוד נעים ושלח הרבה טיפים שימושיים לטיול. מחיר מאוד סביר ותמורה מלאה. שעת העזיבה (10) היתה לנו לא ככ נוחה
מקום נחמד מאוד. שווה את המחיר. לטעמי צריך לעבור שיפוץ קל, אבל סה"כ מומלץ

מיקום מצויין ליד חוף אכזיב
דירת קיבוץ פשוטה, נקייה ומאובזרת טוב מיקרו, טוסטר ומקרר ועוד.
מקלחת זקוקה לשדרוג
בית קטן צנוע ומקסים. חדר קיבוץ של פעם ומעוצב בחינניות. המיקום מעולה, והמקלחת בחצר שוס של ממש.

שנה רביעית שלנו! בית בקיבוץ כולל כל מה שצריך לחופשה. מתאים מאוד למשפחה, התארחנו זוג עם שני ילדים.
נמצא במיקום מעולה קרוב לפעילויות רבות וטבע מדהים. תהנו.
reviews.response: תמיד שמחים לארח אותך לוסי.

reviews.comments: התארחנו 3 לילות עם ילדה בת שנתיים, היה כיף מאוד, המקום לא מתיימר להיות צימר יוקרתי, בכל זאת בתחילה הרגשנו שהוא פחות מפנק ממה שהתרשמנו מהתמונות. התרגלנו מהר ולילדה היה כיף עם מלא משחקים וספרים שיש בארונות. האטרציה המרכזית של המקום שהוא מרחק 3 דקות נסיעה מחופי אכזיב. נחמד לבשל כי יש תבלינים ורטבים שנשארו ממבקרים קודמים. שירותים/מקלחת די צפופים ולא מפנקים, המקלחת היא דוש מהגובה בלבד. מזרן בחדר שינה הרגיש ממש לא מושקע. אמיר המארח סידר לנו להיכנס לבריכת הקיבוץ במחיר נוח. .
דירה פשוטה נקייה ומאובזרת היטב. היינו 3 לילות עם 2 ילדים והיה תענוג. תמורה מעולה למחיר.

מקום שקט ונהדר לבסיס לטיולים באיזור. הדירה פשוטה, נקייה ויש בה כל מה שצריך, אפילו ספרים וצעצועים לילדים. מיקום מעולה בקרבת חוף אכזיב ומסלולי טיול בסביבה. הקיבוץ יפה ונעים.  התקשורת עם אמיר היתה נהדרת והכל הלך חלק. היינו משפחה עם שלושה ילדים קטנים ונהנינו מאוד!

מקום חמוד, היתרון הגדול שלו הוא שהוא מאוד קרוב לחוף אכזיב, דירה קטנה ומאוד פשוטה, מחולקת טוב ומתאימה מאוד למשפחות. יש שלושה מזרונים שאפשר לפרוס על הרצפה לילדים. והסלון מאוד נעים. השירותים והמקלחת מאוד קטנים, החדר שינה הוא ממ"ד והוא טיפונת חנוק. הגינה נחמדה אבל לא מושקעת במיוחד. קמנו בבוקר ויצאנו לים ולטייל, לא הרגשנו שיש מה לעשות במקום עצמו. האזור מהמם!
ממליצים בחום! אירוח נפלא, מתאים מאוד לילדים. ניכר שחשבו כל כל הפרטים הכי קטנים. נהנו נאוד!
בית חמוד ומקסים בפשטותו. מאורגן לכל מה שנדרש, מיקום מצוין לאתרים וטבע. זמינות מארחים גבוהה.

Гостеприимный хозяин, отличное место отдыха для тех, кто ищет тишины в райском уголке среди цветов и деревьев. Море в 5 минутах езды на машине, все достопримечательности севера Израиля под рукой. Рекомендую!

דירה מתוקה ונעימה. בסגנון של פעם עם טאץ' אישי, בלי פנפון יתר.  הקירות הצבעוניים, המזווה המצויד, ארון המשחקים לילדים, המיטה הנוחה  והחצר והשקט הפכו את השהייה לכיפית. המיקום מנצח, שלוש דקות מאכזיב, והתקשורת עם אמיר הייתה מהירה ונעימה.
We vonden het kiboetshuis speciaal, ingericht in jaren 50 meubilair. Het is iets spartaans ingericht, maar dat past bij het huis. Het is een mooie uitvalsplek voor Akko en de Rosh ha Nikra.
Das kleine Haus ist zweckmäßig eingerichtet und liegt so, dass mit dem Auto Sehenswürdigkeiten leicht erreichbar sind. Der örtliche Bäcker hat großartiges Brot, Samstag und Sonntag geschlossen.

Es war wunderschön. Die Lage, die Menschen, Das Häuschen und das Meer, es war alles was man sich wünschen kann. Das Häuschen ist klein, aber sauber und gemütlich. Die Nachbarn sehr freundlich. Von Amir und seiner Familie haben wir sehr viel Wärme, Herzlichkeit und Hilfe erfahren. Die Umgebung ist wunderschön. Ich würde es gerne noch mal kommen.
Endroit roots mais avec tout le confort, tres bon matelas et eau chaude. Centralement bien placer pour visiter le nord d Israel et profiter des plus belles plages.

Wir haben Amir nicht persönlich kennengelernt, dennoch hat alles wunderbar geklappt. Mail Kontakt war super und zuverlässig. Die Nachbarschaft ist großartig und hat uns geholfen, das Haus zu finden.
Es ist ein schöner ruhiger Platz um die Gegend im Norden Israels zu erkunden. Wir haben alles so vorgefunden, wie Amir es beschrieben hat.

Das kleine Häuschen im Kibbuz ist hübsch und liebevoll eingerichtet. Amir hat eine prima Wegbeschreibung geschickt und war immer für uns erreichbar. Die Atmosphäre im Kibbuz war sehr angenehm und aufgeschlossen. Die Lage ist wunderbar, nah am Meer und mit Auto kann man tolle Tagesausflüge in Galiläa unternehmen: Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt!

Wir haben 7 Tage in Amirs Haus verbracht. Amir hat uns im Vorfeld einen Anfahrtsplan gesendet und nützliche Informationen bereitgestellt. Die Kommunikation war bestens. Auch als wir Amir im Kibutz trafen, war er sehr nett und gab uns noch weitere Tipps für Ausflüge. Das Haus war exakt so, wie beschrieben, sauber, einfach aber charmant und mit allem Nötigen ausgestattet. Schöne Strände sind gut erreichbar und die Kibutz-Bäckerei ist grandios. Ich würde diesen Ort auf jeden Fall empfehlen - auch als Ausgangspunkt um den Norden Israels zu erkunden.

La caseta és antiga i bàsica però està perfectament equipada per passar-hi uns dies. Ės acollidora i és un bon punt per explorar la regió. El kibbutz té una botiga 24h a l'entrada i benzinera a l'entrada.   L'Amir és super agradable i atent.

name: Healing Space
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace: desk - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Private backyard – Not fully fenced - An open space on the property usually covered in grass
Single level home - No stairs in home
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: יחידת דיור נפרדת. חדשה לגמרי. מעוצבת בסגנון כפרי ומפנק, ממוקמת ממש מול יער בית קשת ונוף לחצר פנימית הכוללת בריכת דגים ונוי מרהיבה. מתאימה ליחיד או לזוג.ביחידה יש מטבחון עם מיני מקרר, כיריים חשמליים, טוסטר אובן וכלי אוכל בישול ואפיה בסיסיים, פינת קפה, מצעים ומגבות נקיים, שמפו מרכך סבון.The spaceחדר הארוח (יחידת דיור נפרדת) נקי, אסטטי ומעוצב בסגנון כפרי עם רצפת פרקט, מקלחת מפנקת, מיטת עץ מלא, כורסאות נוחים, פינת אוכל קטנה, מטבחון מאובזר לבישול ואפיה בסיסיים ומרפסת הפונה לבריכת דגים ונוי ויער בית קשת. מסלולי הליכה בתוך היער במרחק דקה הליכה מהחדר.Guest accessהיחידה והמרפסת פרטיים ועומדים לרשותךOther things to noteיחידת הדיור ממוקמת בשכונת מגורים. היא פרטית ונעימה ועם זאת, ייתכן ותשמעו את השכנים או תראו אותנו או אורחים אחרים בחצר.
additional_house_rules: היחידה נמצאת בתוך שכונת מגורים. ברצוננו לשמור על שכנות טובה ולכן אנו מבקשים להקפיד ולשמור על סביבה שקטה בייחוד באזור המרפסת.
interaction: במהלך השהיה אהיה זמינה בטלפון לכל עניין. ביחידה ישנו מכשיר פלאפון באמצעותו אפשר לפתוח את שער הקיבוץ.

reviews.comments: My husband and I came from Miami to visit our son and his family who live very close to Beit Keshet in the lower Gallil. The Healing Space is small but perfect for a couple. The hiking trail is beautiful and the location is great for all of the activities available in the Kinneret. The room is neat and clean and Reut was very easy to deal with.

We had a very nice stay at Reut's place!
The place is super pleasant and comfortable for staying in, and at the same time an excellent location for touring the area.
We imagine in the spring time all the nature right outside the house is even more amazing, but even in the late summer, it was super fun to be able to walk a few steps and walk in the forest or the path around the kibbutz.
Reut was available for anything we needed, sent us plenty of recommendations and generally was a wonderful host.

Looking forward to visit again :)
The place was perfect ! Spacious and confortable. Would highly recommend !

Great value
Beautiful place

We had a lovely stay at Reut's place. The space is really nicely designed and we enjoyed the view from the balcony. As mentioned in the description, the unit is next to other houses so there isn't complete privacy but it's still quiet and pleasant. Reut sent us plenty of recommendations which was super useful!

We had a great time at Reut's place. The room is located right across a beautiful forest and offers a quiet relaxing experience. The room is highly clean and has a well equiped kitchen. The space is big, cozy and very well designed, exactly as described and showed in the pictures. Reut was very responsive and communicative, and assisted with every question or problem we had. We would highly recommend Reut's place for future visitors in the area.

This apartment was just as advertised, and everything you need for a perfect, quiet get-away close to nature. The room was comfortable, the kitchen well stocked, the patio lovely, and access to hiking trails right outside the door. What more could you want for a few days of rest in the Galil?

The place is stylish, clean and beautiful. Reut was extremely helpful and gave wonderful tips. The location is amazing, walking distance from a trail in the forest. Great value for money. Definitely recommend it!

Great place to fine peace and calm.
The place is clean and beautiful, the garden is just in front of the forest, amazing place to walk around and enjoy the nature.
The hosts are very kind, gave us great tips and were really thoughtful.
I am absolutely coming back, and recommend this place to every couple/singles that want an escape from the busy life.

Staying was wonderful, quiet and relaxing
Reut was kind, the hut is well equiped and clean
We had a great time !

מקום מקסים! ביחידה אפשר למצוא כל מה שרק צריך. מעוצב מהמם, מרפסת קטנה וכיפית ובעיקר אווירה מהממת של רוגע ונחת. רעות מקסימה, הייתה זמינה לכל שאלה, נתנה המון (!) המלצות. בית קשת כ"כ יפה, מקווים לחזור שוב(:

התארחנו בדירה בסופש. כבר כשנכנסנו ספגנו אנרגיות טובות מהחלל המרווח ומהעיצוב הדירה המהמם. דירה מאוד נקיה ומשרה אווירה של רוגע. בדירה יש כורסאות ושולחן מאוד נוחים המאפשרים זמן קריאה והתרגעות. חדר האמבטיה במקום מעוצב מדהים.
המארחים אנשים מקסימים וטובים שעשו עבורנו באופן אישי הרבה מהמקובל.
ממליץ בחוםמ למי שמחפש/ת באיזור.

רעות מקסימה שירותים ואכפתית, היה שיח שהוא היה פשוט תענוג וטוב. עזרה בהכל, נתנה מענה מיידי. לא מובן מאליו.
פינקה בחדר בדברים נוספים ורואים שיש הגדלת ראש מאוד טובה שלה בכל דבר. תודה!

המקום של רעות היה עבורי גן עדן קטן לסופשבוע מנוחה :)
עם עיצוב כל כך נעים וטבעי, מלא בספרים מרתקים, ממוקם מול יער עם מרפסת קטנה ופרטית.
מושלם!
רעות הייתה שם לכל שאלה ובקשה, ובאופן כללי היה מאוד נעים להתקשר איתה :)
באמת שזה מקום מרפא - מאוד ממליצה!
היחידה מעוצבת בצורה נעימה ונוחה, כיף להירגע בה. היה את כל מה שצריך, ברמה גבוהה. בהחלט אשמח לחזור ולהמליץ.

יחידת אירוח נעימה ומיוחדת.
מקווים לחזור שוב.
תודה לרעות ואורי על הכל
V

מקום נעים, שקט נוף לגינה מקסימה
רעות שלחה לנו מלא המלצות לטיולים, למסעדות
היה פשוט תענוג

היה מקסים, המקום מהמם ונקי.
והאזור מהמם לטייל בו..
מומלץ בחום!

התארחנו ביחידה במשך שני לילות ותוך כדי הביקור כבר המלצנו למשפחה וחברים. המקום נקי, מואר ויש בו את כל מה שצריך. מאוד כיף לשבת במרפסת מול הנוף היפהפה של יער בית קשת. מורגש שהושקעה מחשבה רבה בעיצוב של המקום כדי שיהיה נעים ומרגיע. רעות היתה זמינה בשבילנו בכל מה שצריך. ללא ספק נחזור שוב.
מקום חמוד ומאוד משתלם, יוצר יחד עם האזור בו הוא נמצא אווירה של רוגע וקסם. המארחים אדיבים ודואגים לרווחתך במהלך השהות ומסביב לה. מומלץ ביותר!
אנשים מקסימים, יחידה מסוגננת ונעימה מאוד לשהות של זוג,במקום קיימים ספרים מרתקים בנושאים שונים. אחזור בעתיד :)

name: Our Little Strawberry 🍓 Charming Condo in RP
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Private backyard – Fully fenced - An open space on the property usually covered in grass
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Keypad - Check yourself into the home with a door code
description: A charming and quiet private housing unit by Routh-90 in Rosh Pinna located 5 minutes away from the local shopping centers, the best restaurants and pubs. About 10 minutes away from The Agamon Hula-JNF Nature and Birding Park and 10 minutes walk to the public pool of Rosh Pinna.  Suitable for a couple or a single traveler ✔Comfy Bedroom & Sofa ✔Fully Equipped Kitchen ✔Private Terrace ✔2 TVs, Smart HD Cable TV with Netflix ✔High-Speed Wi-Fi ✔Free Parking ✔AC ✔Privet Strawberry Field :) ראה מתורגם לעברית בהמשךThe spaceיחידת דיור פרטית מקסימה ושקטה ליד כביש 90 בראש פינה הממוקמת במרחק 5 דקות נסיעה ממרכזי הקניות של ראש פינה, מסעדות וברים. כ 10 דקות נסיעה מאגמון החולה ו 10 דקות הליכה מהבריכה העירונית.מתאימה לזוג + ילד או מטייל יחיד.  ✔מיטה וספה נוחות מאוד ✔ מטבח מאובזר במלואו ✔ מרפסת פרטית גדולה ✔ 2 טלויזיות. בסלון יש 45 אינץ' HD חכמה עם כבלים ואפלקציות כמו Netflix  ✔ אינטרנט מהיר ✔ מזגן עוצמתי ✔בקרבת מסעדות ומרכזים מסחריים ✔10 דק' הליכה מהבריכה העירונית ✔ חניה ללא עלות ✔ שדה תותים קטן מחוץ לדלת :)Guest accessThe entire apartment is exclusively yours, without interruption for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself at home.✔ Wi-Fi✔ 45'' HD TV with cables in the living area✔ 35'' TV in bedroom ✔ Free Parking✔ Powerful AC✔ Strawberries from the field (seasonal. Shared with the landlord)✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen -Appliances' pots & pans, dinnerware, utensils, cutlery etc.הדירה כולה היא אך ורק שלך, ללא הפרעה למשך שהותך, אז הרגע, תתתרווח ותרגיש בבית.✔ Wi-Fi✔ בגודל 45 אינץ' עם כבלים באזור המגורים ובחדר השינה HD טלוויזיית ✔ טלוויזיה בגודל 35 אינץ 'בחדר השינה✔ חניה חינם✔ מזגן עוצמתי✔ תותים ישר מהשדה (עונתי. משותף עם בעל הבית)✔ מטבח מאובזר במלואו - סירים ומחבתות, מכשירי חשמל, כלי אוכל, כלים, סכו"ם וכדומה
additional_house_rules:
• NO PARTIES ALLOWED.
No parties or hospitality of guests beyond what is stated on your reservation. The number of guests beyond it is prohibited. We will charge $15 per night for each additional person staying in the apartment without permission.

• LAUD MUSIC \ NOISE IS FORHIBITED BETWEEN 11PM TO 8AM.

• SMOKING IS FORHIBITED INSIDE THE UNIT.
 A penalty of $300 will be applied for smoking in the unit. Smoking allowed outside only

• Please avoid causing damages to the furniture or stains on sheets, towels, etc.  otherwise we would need to charge you for the expenses.

• Please do not lose TV or AC remotes - Please keep them in their places.

• There will be fee of $25 per night, per additional guest above the guests’ amount stated within the reservation. 

• Pet fee - $50 per pet.




• אסור מסיבות או אירוח מעבר לכמות המוזמנים שהוצהר בהזמנה.
 כמות האורחים מעבר למגבלה אסורה. נגבה $15 ללילה לכל אדם נוסף ששוהה בדירה ללא אישור.

• השמעת מוזיקה או כל רעש מוגזם שעלול להפריע לשכנים אסורה בין השעות 23:00 עד 08:00.

•העישון בתוך היחידה אסור בהחלט
 קנס של 300 $ יחול על עישון בפנים. עישון מותר בחוץ בלבד

• אנא הימנע מגרימת נזק לרהיטים או כתמים על סדינים, מגבות וכו 'אחרת נצטרך לגבות את העלות.

• נא לא לאבד שלטי טלוויזיה או המזגן - אנא שמרו אותם במתקנים שלהם.

• תחויב בתשלום של $15 ללילה, לכל אורח נוסף מעל לסכום האורחים הנקוב בהזמנה

• דמי חיות מחמד - 50 דולר על כל חיית מחמד.

reviews.comments: We had 3 nights stay in this lovely strawberry villa, and I could say we enjoy every moment of it. Clean, cozy place in amazing neighborhood of Rosh Pina, 25 minutes walk from center and all restaurants and malls, shopping centers. I highly recommend this place, great experience.

The room is causy and nice. Near all central locations in Rosh Pina
The bed was too hard for me but maybe other people would like it.
Amazing cozy apartment, clean, with a nice smart TV. The host is communicative and friendly. Highly recommended!!

This place is great!
convenient location only 2 minutes drive from the center of Rosh Pina. Place is very clean, recently renovated and very stylish. Fully equipped kitchen with everything we needed, including an espresso machine with capsules, and two tvs. The hosts were available and helpful from the moment we checked in. We couldn’t get over the value for money that this place offered. We really hope to come next year.
Amazing place, amazing host.

This apartment was beautiful, spotlessly clean, and perfectly equipped. I couldn't ask for more.
Shoshi and Nadav left me a beautiful bowl of strawberries. I seldom eat strawberries because they're generally sprayed. But these strawberries came from their garden right outside my room! Lovely surprise.
The famous migratory bird sanctuary is just a 10-minute drive north on Route 90. And Abu Salach's terrific restaurant is just a 5-minute drive south on Route 90. So this apartment is a superbly located.
יחידה נהדרת, במיקום טוב, שקט ונעים. היחידה מתכוננת בהיגיון ומרווחת עבור זוג, המטבח מצויד היטב, מארחים קשובים ומסבירי פנים.

תודה רבה לנדב, שושי ועמוס. לא יכולנו לקבל מקום טוב יותר עם מארחים אדיבים כמוכם. היחידה נמצא במיקום מעולה, ללא בעיות חניה ובדיוק כפי שתואר וצולם באתר. האזור שקט ביותר וניתן להגיע למרכז ראש פינה גם ברגל. היחידה מאובזרת בכל מה שצריך כולל חתולה חמודה :-) נחזור שוב בודאות. בחירה מנצחת !

החופשה בראש פינה הייתה נהדרת,
יחידה נעימה, נקיה ושקטה, במיקום מעולה.
תודה לשושי ועמוס המקסימים שדאגו לנו.
נשמח לחזור שוב ❤️
דירה יפה, נעימה ונקייה מאד. תאמה את התמונות והתיאור ואפילו זכינו לכמה תותים קטנים ומתוקים (למרות שזו לא העונה). שושי היתה מקסימה ופינקה אותנו במאפים עם ברכת שנה טובה. ממליצים מאד
מקום נעים ונח, חצר חמודה עם שיחי תותים. מיקום מצוין, קרוב להרבה נקודות נחמדות בצפון. מומלץ
הדירה כפי שהוצגה בתמונות, תמורה טובה למחיר ומיקום טוב למשפחה לטיול באיזור, מארחים טובים נהננו מאוד
יחידת דיור חמודה ומקסימה. מטבח קטן ומצויד (אחלה קפה במכונה). שולחן אוכל חביב בגינה. לא במרחק הליכה מראש-פינה העתיקה והציורית אבל ממש קרוב ברכב. מאד נהנינו
הדירה הייתה נקייה נוחה ומאובזרת בכל מה שצריך. מארחים מקסימים שנענו לכל בקשה ודאגו שהשהייה תיהיה הכי טובה שאפשר. ממליצה בחום!
התארחנו אצל שושי המקסימה שמיד עם קבלתנו דאגה לנו לציוד,שהיה חסר עבור התינוקת שלנו, הייתה אדיבה ונעימה, פינקה בנשנושים טעימים עם הגעתנו. החדר נעים, נקי ומרווח. ממליצים מאוד
יחידת דיור, מפנקת,יפה ומטופחת... הכל בטוב טעם וברמת ניקיון גבוהה. מרפסת קטנה ואינטימית עם תותחים קטנים בגינה שמוסיף לאווירה. נהנו מאוד תודה ומקווים לחזור שוב! והמחיר מדהים.

הזמנו את היחידה ליומיים, והיה מדהים!
בעלי הבית שושי ועמוס אנשים מקסימים שרק דאגו שיהיה נוח וטוב והכל במאור פנים!
היחידה מהממת הכל חדש לגמרי ונקי מאוד! נהננו עד הגג!
יחידה נעימה נקיה ויפה המארחים יצאו מגידרם להנעים את זמננו תודה רבה היה מושלם ממליץ בחום על המקום..

התארחנו בדירה של נדב כשבוע ימים. הדירה מקסימה, נקייה והבעלים נהדרים! כשהגענו לדירה חיכתה לנו צלחת פירות וצלחת תותים טרייה מהגינה שלהם. במהלך השהות קיבלנו 3 פעמים מגבות נקיות וכל בקשה / או שאלה נענתה מיד. ממליצים בחום!

We took Nadav’s apartment for six days and we’re traveling around with our dog. The apartment is very clean and tidy. We’ve received at the first day, fresh fruits and strawberries from the organic garden outside the apartment. The hosts are very nice and warm people. Answered all our questions, were pleasant and patient to any request we had. We are strongly recommend Nadav’s place and hope to come there again soon!

name: Private separate studio in a Kibbutz near Akko
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: Our private cute and separate room is ready for you. It's the only room in our second floor of our house, with separate entrance, and very nice balcony so you'll be able to enjoy privacy. We live on the first floor and ready to assist you any time.The spaceIts a cute and cool gallery. We have one large bed built by us and based on pallets. The entire room contains hand made art unique paintings. The room has separate entrance with no need for interaction with us. It best fit for young spirit travelers and couples. We can also provide you with additional mattress if you'll need it for a child. There's a new kitchen installed and a fridge!Guest accessGuests will have access to the second floor only and can use also the nice roof. The roof has table, chairs and even removable hammock. The room contains a bathroom with shower only for guests usage.Excellent Israeli breakfasts (!!!) can be found 100meters from our place in a beautiful coffee/restaurant place called "Alto", and there's also an original Georgian restaurant serving mostly dinner in a unique spirit.During the summer our Kibbutz swimming pool in open (end of May to beginning of September) for some 15$ per person.Other things to noteThe room equipped with a new kitchen, refrigerator and all you need to arrange yourself a fine meal. We will clean the room and well prepare it properly before your arrival.
additional_house_rules:
We respect guests understanding that the room is separate but part of our house. We live in a calm and quite community and guests should behave properly. We prefer guests with no pets. 
The entire house is non smoking and so as the room. Guests can smoke on the balcony as they wish. 
We ask guests to keep the room as they got it.
interaction: We love hosting guest and you'll feel it. You can interact with us anytime and we'll help you. We can also assist you to get along and travel in the beautiful Galilee. We are home during most of the time and if we're not there a friend of ours will be available.
transit: Public transportation is available mainly from the nearest city Akko. We have parking place near the house for those coming by car. If you're coming strait from the AIRPORT - the best is to take a direct train to Akko (less than 2 hours) and from Akko better to take a taxi to Shomrat. It will take some 5-10 minutes (some 8$).

reviews.comments: Great clean place with great hospitality.
Our family  had a great pleasure to stay at Amir's place. It's very quite, cozy and authentic. We'll return if we'll want to travel in the Western Galilee.
nice size room with a sweet terrace.  Amir was very responsive to all of our needs. It was a short drive to the old city of Akko.

A cosy place with great outdoor space. Apartment was very clean and had everything we needed for cooking and being comfortable. Amir is a great host who helped us with great tips about hiking and dining. I would love to stay there again!
We had a lovely stay in this cozy and homey studio. Amir was super responsive and helpful.

Amir’s place offers a perfect kibbutz stay. It was a great central location, close to everything for daily activities but felt remote enough that if we wanted to hang home for s few hours on a lazy rainy afternoon we had no regret. Amir and his family are very lovely and give great tips about the area. A wonderful slice of Israeli life to experience. Would happily go back anytime.
Very comfortable place close to many local attractions. Amir's local tips were great
Very nice and clean place, good vibe

Peaceful, convenient spacious studio with private terrace, amazing dawn chorus of native birds. Amir & Sharon are responsive hosts. You do need a car or take bus; would be a long walk to Akko.

There is hairdryer, instant coffee and tea, sugar, hot plate and small refrigerator. Also foam couch where 3rd person could sleep.

Highly recommend kibbutz Giat Dairy café, good value and nutritious large, interesting meals - for breakfast go early (8am) or make reservation. Small kibbutz grocery is well stocked and fair prices for snacks, produce, cheese, etc. A great AirBnb!
Amir and Sharon were such considerate and caring hosts.  We truly enjoyed our stay and look forward to a return visit.

Amir's place was our first kibbutz experience. His room is a spacious separate apartment built on top of his house with a private entrance, kitchen and bath. It's location is super convenient to downtown Akko and Old Town, yet it feels rural, being in the middle of agricultural land. There is a huge patio with hammocks. The bed is on 4" pallets on the floor and the mattress is very comfortable. There is a cafe 100 yards from Amir's house where we had a spectacular "Israeli Breakfast." Amazing. It is worth noting that this community is gated and it can be a little complicated getting the gates open. That problem can be circumvented if you are willing to walk 150 yards to the parking lot on the other side of the gates. If you are lucky, you may get Amir's friend, Amachai, to tell you the story of the founding of the community. It's quite a story.
Last minute request and he responded quickly. A bit isolated. Great place for breakfast just in front. Internet slow. Place is clean and quiet in a kibbutz. Recommended if need a place in the area.

Amir was very accommodating when we stayed in the studio during Shabbat. He gave us a hot plate and a flexible check out time so that we could comfortably observe Shabbat. The space was as described-spacious, comfortable, beautifully decorated, and private. The kibbutz is quiet, gorgeous, and five minutes away from Acre. A wonderful retreat without having to venture too far from civilization!

The room is spacious and very comfortable.
If you are looking for a relaxing time it is just a great option!
There is a hammock you can use.
Amir and his family were really helpful all the time!
I really recommend it!

Staying at Amir's was great. the place was charming and Amir and his wife were very accommodating and generous, and you get great value for your price. When we come back to the western Galilee, we'll surely try to stay at their place.

The kibbutz is beautiful and quiet, a great place to relax. The studio is nicely set up with a small kitchen and sleeping area, and the big balcony with a hammock was perfect for reading or hanging out. Everything in the studio was neat, tidy and in working condition, and Amir was very available and responsive to any questions. He also came up to give us some tips on nearby places to hike and go to the beach, which I really appreciated.

We had a lovely stay at Amir and Sharon's studio in Shomrat. On our first night we arrived very late coming from the airport but Amir waited for us to make sure we got in ok and we're comfortable. The studio is private and the rooftop is great with a very nice view. Hope to come back soon
Great place. Make sure to try the Goat Dairy Cafe/Restaurant as soon as you can. Just trust me;)

Amir's place is in a beautiful kibbutz just outside Akko. He and his wife were very helpful, giving us tips on the area and where to go.  The room was nicely appointed with original artwork. Clean hot shower and private entrance.  The breakfast at the  cafe where they use the kibbutz's  fresh goat milk butter and artisanal cheese was the best we ever had (and that is not hyperbole).  We are looking forward to a longer stay in the future.

Amir and Sharon made us feel extremely welcome. They live on a beautiful kibbutz outside the city of Akko. Amir described to us in detail what kibbutz life is like and we learned a lot from our conversations. Amir also suggested some great activities for us to do -- both on the kibbutz and in the Galilee area. We enjoyed a beautiful private room with its own entrance with a small view of the sea! We also had access to a gorgeous private roof/balcony with table, chairs and a hammock for enjoying tea in the evening. They are first-class hosts - we loved our time on Kibbutz Shomrat!
Great location, very nice pool
wonderful place
We had a wonderful time at Amir's place. Besides the great experience at the apartment, it was super covenient to all of the beaches and attractions in the area. Amir was very attentive to our needs.

I had a wonderful vacation at Amir's place. The studio is cozy, quiet and peaceful with everything you might need. The best part is a very lovely private terrace. The beach is a 10-minute drive away. Don't miss Alto Cafe which is  just around the corner from the studio. All in all, great value for money.
Nice place in the kibbutz on the roof of the house

Everything was great- the apartment is in great condition, very clean, fully equipped. Amir is a great host, very kind and responsive.
The area is quiet. I will be glad to use this accommodation on my next trip.

Amir's place is warm and cozy and in a wonderful location. Just what we needed.
We got great local tips and enjoyed our stay, and even got great blintzes one day!

Great value for money, recommended!
We had an amazing chilling vacation. Loved the outside, the sunset is viewed from the balcony and it was amazing. Small and cozzy place and a very large outside. Thanks for the stay :)

We enjoyed our stay at Amir's place.
The apartment looks better than in the pictures, decorated with love and taste. The care of the hosts was evident.

We really liked the outdoor seating area, and the hammock under the vines. perfect.

The apartment of Amir and Sharon is small but very cute and comfortable and has all one needs to have a special holiday in Israel. The hosts are great people and very helpful. We really felt at home and   encourage others to spend time in this apartment. The apartment is near Akko and Haifa and near to the sea, and is not too far to the sea of Galilee. This apartment is a little jewel  in a Kibbutz in the north of Israel!!

The house of Amir and his family is a nice place. We enjoyed our evenings on the huge terrace. We had a lovely welcome with pancakes and information about the area. The room is nicely decorated and it’s big enough for a family with a little child, but for 4 adults, it’s too small.

Awesome place -
There is a delightful mediterranean breeze all day at the balcony. The room itself is equipped with everything you need. Amir is a great host. Very recommended place.
A great studio with ‘soul’; a wonderfull outdoors where you can hang out & eat and the location is quit and close to visit all of the north coast. Recomended!
Such a peaceful and relax place. Such an amazing view and vibes. Recommend +++
Great place,  great hospitality,  great location, we arrived and were treated like family. Looking forward to coming back!!!

We had a super relaxed weekend. The terras was lovely. We enjoyd the kibouts and the local breakfast club ‘Alto’.
The place was very clean. And we slept perfect with the airconditioner.


Very happy we did this trip to Akko.

Amir was really helpful with very good tips for dinner and breakfast. He was very reactive with accurate information. The place is very clean, quiet and spacious. Great terrace to relax in the evening. Interesting to watch life in a kibboutz. I would recommand this place. Alexis

We had a lovely stay at Amir's place. The kibbutz is beautiful and quiet and we had a great time just walking in the lanes and getting lost. The location is excellent - 7 minutes from Akko, 10 minutes from the lovely Achziv beach and close to tons of beautiful nature spots. Amir's apartment was the perfect place to come back to after a long day of exploring the area - it was clean, homey and very welcoming. Thank you, Amir and Sharon! We will be happy to stay with you again in the future.

P.S - do not miss the lovely breakfast at Alto dairy farm (מחלבת אלטו), especially the Labaneh with the sourdough bread (-:
Excelent location for exploring western Galilee. Amir was very kind and the apartment is perfect.
Wonderful space and value with artsy and quaint vibes, loved the stay!

We enjoyed our stay mainly because of the very calm atmosphere, good breeze in the evenings and the convenient location with quick access to the western Galili attractions (city, sea, nature). The studio apartment is decently equipped - with the notable exception of a wardrobe or a chest of drawers which are missing. Amir is a good, friendly host and was quick to respond to any question.

We booked very spontaneously and were extremely grateful that Amir accommodated us at such short notice. We really felt welcomed at Amirs Airbnb. The apartment is nicely decorated, cosy, very clean and has a huge terrace one can use. Amir is a very thoughtful and helpful host. By car Akko and also Haifa can be reached easily. I definitely recommend staying here and would come back myself! Thanks once again Amir!
It’s a lovely apartment - we all slept well and the breakfast on the terrace was beautiful! It’s a beautiful area and we loved the little café with local produce just next to it.
nice and clean. Great value for money!
Everything was great!

We stayed in Amir's place for 7 days and it was a really good experience :). The apartment has everything you need (even if you want to cook) and Amir and his wife are just downstairs if you need something. There are a number of shops close to the place (5 mins by car).

I highly recommend the place for anyone who wants to visit North part of Israel and looking for a great (and relatively cheap) accommodation!
great
Our stay at Amir's place was nice and relaxing. we enjoyed it very much!!
This is a great place to stay. Well designed and Amir is super helpful. Everything is great and we would love to come again!
Very good accommodation, quiet, clean, superfriendly hosts, great Tipps, easy check-in. Very recommendable!

Our stay at Amir's was rather brief, being for just the one night, however the studio and it's location are lovely. Amir was also very friendly and easy to communicate with, making our stay very nice. I wish we could have stayed longer!

Comfortable and really nice appartment within a kibbutz near Acco. When you are travelling by car, this is your place. Really quiet and nice atmosphere. Don't forget to try the breakfast in the kibbutz restaurant!
Absoute recommendation.

It was great to stay with Amir, Sharon and their kids in Shomrat Kibbutz. The area is safe and quiet and just a few minutes drive from Akko. Amir and Sharon gave us great recommendations for the area and North of Israel and was helpful anytime. The apartment is nice and clean and offers everything you need. Definitely a great place to stay when visiting Akko.
Great stay with good recommendations and lovely hand picked tea from the garden! Must say
Amir's place is clean, stylish and has a great big balcony with a nice breeze. It is located about 15 minutes from Accra. The host is nice and sends helpful travel recommendations .
Amazing place to stay and have a whole outstanding "Kibbutz experience". Super caring hosts.

Amir's place was just what we were looking for! We wanted to have a quick trip to the north to get to know the area better. The house was in a perfect location really close to Akko village that is an incredible place. The place was very clean and with a lot of really nice small details. The kibbutz is also very organized and you can find things to make your stay more confortable. I would definitely recommend Amir's place to everyone that wants to visit Akko, Rosh Hanikra and sorroundings. Great place, great experience and a lot of nice memories!
The studio is just perfect. We loved the design, the many details, the terrace! The neighborhood in the kibbuz is quiet, Akko and various beaches are very close. Christina & Markus

Amir’s place is the best choice if you are looking for a relaxing and calm stopover. You won’t hear anything but birds as the house is situated in a kibbutz. We chilled in the hammock and had dinner on our private terrace. The house is built in a modern style and the interior is cozy and unique with a lot of details to discover. The apartment was very clean. We never met the hosts but the communication was perfect. The cherry on the cake would be a sharper kitchen knife, a kitchen towel and some newer towels ;) We would definitely recommend Amir’s place!
reviews.response: Thanks Alexsandra for the review. We now renewed the towels we provide to guests. Sharp knife was there but hidden I guess... We made it opfront. Thanks for helping us serve better. Amir

reviews.comments: Amir was a really nice and caring host who always helped us with any questions. The location was great with a really nice rooftop terrace. It was very clean and had everything we needed. I can really recommend this place!

Even though for just one night, we had a great stay in Amir's home. The studio was clean and had all we needed (a big and spacious terrace that allowed for us to catch some sunshine!), and just a short drive away from pretty Akko. It was a great experience to stay with a local in a Kibbutz, be personally welcomed by Amir and hear his stories about Kibbutz life now and in the past. Definitely recommend!

Great studio with a perfect Terrasse in a nice and quiet kibbutz. The Baha'i gardens are just around the corner, which is great. Otherwise there is not much to do in the kibbutz, but that was the reason why we went there ;)
Very nice and quite place. Clean and comfortable room. Very good restaurants closeby. We spend a great time and hope to come back.
It was our 2nd visit to Amir's place in Shomrat, this time to try the skydive center of the kibbutz. Great second stay, thank you again Amir for your hospitality!

A grate place....
We gatt a picefall quit place
We had a grate time
Amir's place is exactly what we were looking for. The place is clean and very comfortable. We will come back for sure.
This is a very cute and comfortable small apartment with a great balcony, hammock and view of nature. Great surroundings, very quiet and the Kibbutz is welcoming. Had a very relaxing stay.
This place is just amazing, a short drive from Akko (2km) and you are staying in a great spot. Amir and Sharon are really nice and welcoming. The rooftop and the studio is great. Don't think twice !

We really enjoyed staying at Sharon and Amirs place. They gave us some really good recommendations to explore the area (try out banana beach). The rooftop terrace is wonderful. It was possible to get our laundrey in the Kibbuz for a very fair price done. It is very useful to have a car when you are planning to stay there.
היה נחמד מאוד, המקום היה מאוד נקי ומסודר כמו שציפינו.
Thank you so much, Sharon and Amir, for the good time and the good tea in Shomrat. It was a pleasure to be there. The terrasse was so lovely. A perfect accomodation!
It was lovely!
Nice place

Communication with Amir was easy and always received a fast response.
He even agreed to let us in a bit earlier, as we were there already.
He explained everything nicely and gave us recommendations about where and what we can do around.
Place was clean and as described, quiet and relaxing.
Will definitely recommend the place!
- the appartement is really great and very close to Akko (by car). Amir has been very nice and we had a great breakfast in the kibbutz. We hope to come back soon.
Amir is really welcoming and helpful. The place is beautiful and really quiet. Perfect !

We stayed at Amir's place after a few days in Tel Aviv. Wow - what a tranquil and beautiful space to relax. The terrace was spacious and lovely with a hammock and grape vines providing some extra shade while we ate breakfast outside. We would definitely stay here again - Amir was very responsive and we appreciated the cleanliness of the apartment!
A beautiful place, don't think twice!

The place is a kind of little penthouse on a private villa within the Kibbutz, used as a private artist's atelier decorated with paintings and work in progress, otherwise as a place for guests. Tranquil and very well equipped it makes a lovely stay near the historic town of Akko and its beaches. It is in close walking distance to the Baha'i gardens (Bahji), i.e. a perfect place for Baha'is who want to stay in the Akka area. Amir is there for you 24/7, arrival is possible practically any time, reliable and easy. Great hospitality spirit of the the family. I had some special wishes which were fulfilled happily by Amir and more than I expected. You have full privacy with separate entrance and huge terrace with sun protection. Large and very comfortable mattrass, good comforter, very nice and light bathroom. electric shutters, ceiling ventilator or well functioning air conditioning. Little kitchenette well equipped with stove and regular sized fridge. Green and peaceful environment very close to the lively historic town. You are inside the Kibbuz and get an idea about its life today, Amir is happy to share who it works today. Definitely  I will there again when in the area.
Thank you Amir and Sharon, we had a wonderful time staying at your great studio. We've enjoyed so much our stay that we will keep your address for our next trip to Akko.
A great place near ACres , very clean and freindly , highly recommend !!!!

Thanks Amir!  It was great spending my visit at your place.  Everything was very easy.  there was a nearby shop and cage in walking distance.  And walking distance to the bahai Gardens;  closer than (Hidden by Airbnb) maps reported  - basically across the street :)  The apartment was comfortable, good bed and we loved the terrace.  Thanks for everything.  Jennifer
We enjoyed our stay very much and the warm hospitality. We received fresh herbs to make tea and the atelier feel to our room was very unique.
Amir was a great host, communicative and nice. The apartment is clean and cozy. Great for a romantic weekend..

What a great place to stay for visiting the Ancient and Modern city of Acre. Amir and his wife Sharon made our trip fantastic even organizing the best place in Acre for dinner with limited waiting time at a packed restaurant. Thanks again guys!
